Package de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.contracts

package de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.contracts
Defines concrete TestContracts that are not Object test contracts, which are implicit if not vetoed using VetoObjectTestContract Currently defined contracts are:
  • VerifyBeanProperty
  • VerifyBuilder
  • VerifyConstructor
  • VerifyCopyConstructor
  • VerifyFactoryMethod
Author:
Oliver Wolff
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api
    Provides the api for configuring instances of ValueObjectTest, see the individual packages for details.
    de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.generator
    Provides annotations for adding / modifying existing TypedGenerator.
    de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.object
    Provides structures and classes for Object-contract specific tests.
    de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.property
    Provides annotations for configuring / tweaking the management of PropertyMetadata objects that represent the individual properties to be used for testing.
  • Annotation Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    VerifyBeanProperty
    If used on ValueObjectTest this test checks / tests all Bean-properties.
    VerifyBuilder
    If used on ValueObjectTest this test checks / tests builder of value objects.
    VerifyConstructor
    If used on ValueObjectTest this test checks / tests constructors.
    VerifyConstructors
    Wraps a number of VerifyConstructor elements.
    VerifyCopyConstructor
    If used on ValueObjectTest this test verifies a copy-constructor.
    VerifyFactoryMethod
    If used on ValueObjectTest this test checks / tests factory-methods.
    VerifyFactoryMethods
    Wraps a number of VerifyFactoryMethod elements.
